blocks.name: Alert
blocks.template:
{{> IconBlob icon=icon size="sm" color="text-yellow" iconSize="16"}}
{{default type-label "Alert"}}

{{body}}

{{#if button-label}}
{{> Button label=button-label url=button-url icon="arrow-right" style="solid"}}
{{/if}}

blocks.name: Callout
blocks.template:

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Your support helps protect the places we all love.

blocks.name: CardGrid
blocks.template:

{{/if}}

{{#if this.image}} {{/if}}

{{this.label}}
{{/if}} {{#if this.title}}

{{#if this.url}}{{this.title}}{{else}}{{this.title}}{{/if}}

{{/if}} {{#if this.subtitle}}
{{this.subtitle}}
{{/if}} {{#if this.body}}
{{{this.body}}}
{{/if}}
{{/each}}

blocks.name: ExpandableList
blocks.template:
{{#if title}}

{{title}}

{{/if}}
    {{#each items}}
    {{this.title}}
    {{icon "plus" size="18"}}
    {{{prose this.content}}}
    {{/each}}

value.title: What is a land trust?
value.content: A land trust is a nonprofit organization that actively works to conserve land by undertaking or assisting in land or conservation easement acquisition.

value.title: How can I get involved?
value.content: There are many ways to support land conservation, from volunteering with your local land trust to making a donation.

value.title: Accreditation
value.body: Ensuring the highest standards for land trusts across the nation.

value.title: Public Policy
value.body: Advocating for policies that support land conservation.

value.title: Education
value.body: Training and resources for land trust professionals.

value.title: Community
value.body: Building a strong network of conservation organizations.

blocks.name: List
blocks.template:
{{#each items}}
  • {{#if this.icon}}
    {{icon this.icon size="20"}} {{#if this.label}} {{this.label}} {{/if}}
    {{else if this.label}}
    {{this.label}}
    {{/if}} {{#if this.body}}
    {{{this.body}}}
    {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}

blocks.name: Quote

fields.name: Quote
fields.value: Conservation is a cause that has no end. There is no point at which we will say our work is finished.

blocks.name: SiteFooter
blocks.template:
Connect with Us
{{{default address "

1250 H Street NW, Suite 600
Washington, DC 20005

202-638-4725

"}}}
{{#if (length socials)}}
{{#each socials}} {{icon this.icon size="20"}} {{/each}}
{{/if}}
Save the Land
{{{default donate "

When you support the Land Trust Alliance, your contribution helps to save more of the land you love.

"}}}
{{> Button label="Donate" url="#" icon="arrow-right" style="solid"}}
Subscribe
{{{default subscribe "

Learn how you can help land trusts gain ground sign up for our newsletter.

"}}}
{{#if (length menu-columns)}}
{{#each menu-columns}}
{{#if this.title}}
{{this.title}}
{{/if}} {{#if (length this.links)}}
    {{#each this.links}}
  • {{this.label}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
{{/each}}
{{/if}}
{{default copyright "© 20172026 Land Trust Alliance, Inc. All rights reserved."}}

fields.name: Donate
fields.value: When you support the Land Trust Alliance, your contribution helps to save more of the land you love.

fields.name: Subscribe
fields.value: Learn how you can help land trusts gain ground sign up for our newsletter.

fields.name: Copyright
fields.value: 20172026 Land Trust Alliance, Inc. All rights reserved.

blocks.name: SiteHeader
blocks.template:
{{#if logo}} {{else}} {{default title "Land Trust Alliance"}} {{/if}}
{{#each nav-items}} {{this.label}} {{/each}} {{#if button-label}} {{> Button label=button-label url=button-url style="solid"}} {{/if}}

blocks.name: Stats
blocks.template:
{{#if title}}

{{/if}}
{{/if}}
{{#each stats}}
{{> IconBlob icon=this.icon size="md"}}
{{#if this.label}}
{{this.label}}
{{/if}} {{#if this.stat}}
{{this.stat}}
{{/if}} {{#if this.body}}
{{{this.body}}}
{{/if}} {{#if this.url}} {{default this.button_label "Learn more"}} {{icon "caret-right" size="24"}} {{/if}}
{{/each}}

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Land trusts across the country are saving land and harnessing the power of conservation to help make their communities stronger.

value.label: Land trust members
value.body: Land trusts are community-led and supported and protect lands and waters that benefit everyone.

value.label: Acres Protected
value.body: The Land Trust Alliance has set a bold goal for land trusts to conserve another 60 million acres by the end of the decade.

value.label: Years of Service
value.body: The Land Trust Alliance works passionately to support land trusts so they can secure more land now and for future generations.
